text: I did'nt know what to do in my life until the past year, I was lost but I knew that it wanted to do something linked with the internet and social media because I grew up with it and I love to see what the internet can produce when a lot of people have a strong will. So I search for jobs that are linked to the internet and found out the job of Community Manager (CM). This job consist of doing the posts of a brand, a group or famous people on social media and do reports of what is good what is bad, trying to find what pleases the customers and what are they expecting of the brand. Then you do reports to the team you are working with to try to improve your image on social media according to the other branches of the team. I did'nt realize until then that it could be a real job and a job that serious. So it came like an illumination to me when I read this. I always read post of brands on twitter (most of the time) making jokes with the community but being serious at the same time and I always wondered "Who are the people making these jokes ?" because when we say " Netflix is so funny on Twitter, the way they answer is always cool.", it is actually the community ma,ager behind the account that is funny, not the people making the money. So I find it cool to have a direct link with a community and see how they react. I saw it as a good way to do a job that could please me and be linked with the internet at the same time. So I decided to follow a way that would bring me to this job at the end. That's why I am here this year, studying in information and communication at Rennes 2 university.
